RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON , D.C. - The U.S. Justice Department has filed charges of cyberespionage against several Chinese government officials , the broadcaster NBC reported Monday , citing unnamed U.S. officials .

WASHINGTON , D.C. - The U.S. Justice Department has filed charges of cyberespionage against several Chinese government officials , the broadcaster NBC reported Monday , citing unnamed U.S. officials .

WASHINGTON , D.C. - The U.S. Justice Department has filed charges of cyberespionage against several Chinese government officials , the broadcaster NBC reported Monday , citing unnamed U.S. officials .
The case , which marks the first time that the United States has brought hacking charges against another country , is expected to be confirmed by Attorney General Eric Holder later Monday .
